I should start by finding a flight from St. Petersburg to Appleton on March 19th and a return flight on March 21st. I also need to find accommodations, attractions, and restaurants for the two days. If the cost exceeds the budget, I should prioritize finding cheaper accommodations or flights. If the cheapest options have been selected and the cost still exceeds the budget, I should start finding cheaper restaurants for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

When creating your next plan, only change one attribute from your current plan. For instance, if you will change the accomodation for the next plan, do not change anything else, such as the breakfast or the flight.
